title: How to Add Someone to Your Hotmail Contact List

steps.title: Open your web browser.
steps.content: Open your web browser. Go to Hotmail at http://www.hotmail.com .

steps.title: Sign in to your Hotmail account.
steps.content: Sign in to your Hotmail account.

steps.title: Click on the chat icon in the upper right corner of the page.
steps.content: Click on the chat icon in the upper right corner of the page.

steps.title: Choose Facebook, Google, or both to connect to your contacts.
steps.content: Choose Facebook, Google, or both to connect to your contacts. A window will appear asking you to confirm the connection. Click on "okay" or "connect".

steps.title: Once you've approved the connection, you should have no problem adding your Facebook friends or Google contacts to your Hotmail account.
steps.content: Once you've approved the connection, you should have no problem adding your Facebook friends or Google contacts to your Hotmail account.

steps.title: Open your web browser.
steps.content: Open your web browser. Go to Hotmail at http://www.hotmail.com .

steps.title: Look at the upper left of the screen where it says the word "Outlook".
steps.content: Look at the upper left of the screen where it says the word "Outlook". There is a down arrow next to that. Click on the down arrow.

steps.title: A new page opens with a bunch of categories.
steps.content: A new page opens with a bunch of categories. Click the red box that says "People".

steps.title: Another new page opens.
steps.content: Another new page opens. At the top of this page there's a plus sign in a circle, and the word "New". Click on this.

steps.title: Now a page (within the page) opens that says "Add new contact."
steps.content: Now a page (within the page) opens that says "Add new contact."

steps.title: Type in your contact's information.
steps.content: Type in your contact's information. When done, click "Save" at the bottom.
